name: @elizaos/plugin-knowledge-root
description: Knowledge and RAG plugin for elizaOS - provides retrieval augmented generation capabilities
author: elizaOS

scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: cd typescript && vitest run || echo 'TypeScript tests skipped - no tests found'
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt || echo 'Rust lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python:fix: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint fix skipped'

CTX_KNOWLEDGE_ENABLED.description: Enables or disables contextual knowledge functionality; when set to 'true' additional text-generation settings are validated.

EMBEDDING_PROVIDER.description: Specifies which provider to use for generating embeddings (e.g., openai, google). If omitted the code assumes 'openai' through plugin-openai.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate requests to OpenAI services for embeddings or text generation.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Name of the OpenAI embedding model; also used as a fallback for TEXT_EMBEDDING_MODEL when EMBEDDING_PROVIDER defaults to openai.

TEXT_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Embedding model name to use with the configured EMBEDDING_PROVIDER.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Alternative variable to supply embedding dimension when using OpenAI.

TEXT_PROVIDER.description: Provider to use for text generation when contextual knowledge is enabled (e.g., openai, anthropic, openrouter, google).

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: API key for Anthropic text generation models.

OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: API key for OpenRouter when using it as a text provider.

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: API key for Google AI services used for embeddings or text generation.

OPENAI_BASE_URL.description: Custom base URL for routing OpenAI API requests (useful for proxies).

ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL.description: Custom base URL for Anthropic API requests.

OPENROUTER_BASE_URL.description: Custom base URL for OpenRouter API requests.

GOOGLE_BASE_URL.description: Custom base URL for Google AI API requests.

TEXT_MODEL.description: The specific text generation model to use with the selected TEXT_PROVIDER.

MAX_INPUT_TOKENS.description: Maximum number of input tokens permitted per request.

MAX_OUTPUT_TOKENS.description: Maximum number of output tokens that can be generated.

MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS.description: Upper bound on concurrent API requests for rate limiting.

REQUESTS_PER_MINUTE.description: Maximum number of API requests allowed per minute.

TOKENS_PER_MINUTE.description: Maximum number of tokens that can be processed per minute.

KNOWLEDGE_PATH.description: Filesystem path where the knowledge loader searches for documents. Overrides the default ./docs directory.

LOAD_DOCS_ON_STARTUP.description: Controls whether the plugin should automatically load documents from the docs folder when the agent starts. Any value other than the string 'false' enables loading.
